title: How to answer 'What are your future plans for the company if permanently employed' in a job interview - Quora

response.answer_text: Assuming that you know what the company does, you will have already thought through: the three or four constituencies of the position,Some of their problems, andsome of your recommendations.If you haven’t carefully considered these questions, you are unprepared to interview. You should, then, not be surprised when you don’t get the job or promotion.
